verifier.task

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • verifier.task.Task
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalTask

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Tasks represent a computation job, the result of which will be realized in some future instance. Tasks are abstract because they exist in two places: on the compute node, and on the controller.
